sqlMap.select:
SELECT outstring FROM (SELECT DISTINCT '''' || a.aac002 || '''' || ',''' || a.aac003 || '''' || ',''' || a.aac001 || '''' || ',''' || DECODE(a.aac004, '2', '女', '1', '男', '其他') || '''' || ',''' || TO_CHAR(a.aac006, 'yyyy-MM-dd') || '''' || ',''' || a.aae044 || '''' || ',''' || a.yac995 || '''' || ',''' || a.yac996 || '''' || ',''' || a.yac997 || '''' || ',''' || a.yab139 ||''''|| ',''' || a.aab001 || '''' AS outstring , A.AAC006, DECODE(#aac002#,a.aac002,'1',a.aac003,'2',a.aac001,'3',a.yac995,'4',a.yac996,'5',a.yac997,'6','9') AS sx FROM (SELECT a.aac002, a.aac003, a.aac001, a.aac004, (SELECT aae044 FROM ae10 WHERE aaz001 = b.aab001) aae044, a.aac006, b.aab001, PKG_COMM.FUN_GETAAA103('AAB301', b.yab139) yab139, a.yac995, a.yac996, a.yac997 FROM (SELECT a.yac557, a.aac060, a.aac002, a.aac003, a.aac001, a.aac004, a.aac006, a.yac995, a.yac996, a.yac997 FROM ac01 a WHERE 1 = 1 AND DECODE(a.aac060,'1',NVL(a.yac557, '0'),'1') = '1' ) a, (SELECT b.aac001, b.aab001, b.yab139 FROM ac20 b, ac01 c WHERE b.aac001 = c.aac001 AND b.aaz157 = (SELECT MAX(ac20.aaz157) FROM ac20 WHERE ac20.AAZ159 = b.aaz159) AND (c.aac002 = #inputString# OR c.aac003 = #inputString# OR c.aac001 = #inputString#)
b.yab139 = #yab139# ) b WHERE a.aac001 = b.aac001(+) AND DECODE(a.aac060,'1',NVL(a.yac557, '0'),'1') = '1' AND (a.aac002 = #inputString# OR a.aac003 = #inputString# OR a.aac001 = #inputString#) ORDER BY a.aac006) a ORDER BY aac006,sx ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 20

SELECT outstring FROM(SELECT DISTINCT ''''||b.aab001||''''||','''||a.aae044||''''||','''||b.aab999||''''||','''||b.yab019||''''||','''||b.aab019||''''AS outstring FROM ae10 a,ab01 b,ab02 c WHERE a.aaz001 = b.aab001 AND b.aab001 = c.aab001 AND (a.aaz001 = #inputString# OR b.aab999 = #inputString# OR a.aae044 = #inputString# ) ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 20

SELECT c.aab001, c.aae044, c.aab999, c.yab019, c.aab019 FROM(SELECT DISTINCT b.aab001, a.aae044, b.aab999, b.aab019, b.yab019 FROM ae10 a,ab01 b,ab02 c WHERE a.aaz001 = b.aab001 AND b.aab001 = c.aab001 AND (INSTR(a.aaz001,#aab001#)>0 OR INSTR(b.aab999,#aab999#)>0 OR INSTR(a.aae044,#aae044#)>0 ) ) c WHERE ROWNUM <= 20

SELECT outstring FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ''''||a.aaz066||''''||','''||a.yae433||''''||','''||a.aab030||''''AS outstring FROM af06 a, ae10 b WHERE a.aaz066 = #inputString# OR a.yae433 = #inputString# OR a.aab030 = #inputString# ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 20

SELECT a.aaz066, a.yae433, a.aab030 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT a.aaz066, a.yae433, a.aab030 FROM ab24 a WHERE INSTR(a.aaz066, #aaz066#) > 0 OR INSTR(a.yae433, #yae433#) > 0 OR INSTR(a.aab030, #aab030#) > 0 ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= 20

SELECT DISTINCT outstring FROM (SELECT '''' || b.aae044 || '''' || ',''' || a.aae008 || '''' || ',''' || a.aaf002 || '''' || ',''' || a.aaz065 || '''' as outstring FROM af07 a, ae10 b WHERE a.aaz065 = b.aaz001 AND (INSTR(a.aae008, #inputstring# > 0 OR INSTR(b.aae044, #inputstring# > 0) AND ROWNUM < 20 )

SELECT a.aae044, a.aaf002, a.aaz065, a.aae008 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT b.aae044, a.aaf002, a.aaz065, a.aae008 FROM af07 a, ae10 b WHERE a.aaz065 = b.aaz001 AND (INSTR(a.aaz065, #aaz065#) > 0 OR INSTR(a.aae008, #aae008#) > 0 OR INSTR(b.aae044, #aae044#) > 0) ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= 20
SELECT DISTINCT outstring FROM (SELECT ''''||a.aaz001||''''||','''||a.aae044||'''' as outstring FROM ae10 a WHERE (a.aaz001 = #inputString# OR a.aae044 = #inputString# ) ) where rownum <20
SELECT a.aaz001, a.aae044 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT a.aaz001, a.aae044 FROM ae10 a WHERE (INSTR(a.aaz001, #aaz001#) > 0 OR INSTR(a.aae044, #aae044#) > 0 ) ) a where rownum <20

SELECT DISTINCT OUTSTRING FROM (SELECT '''' || A.AAC002 || '''' || ',''' || A.AAC003 || '''' || ',''' || A.AAC001 || '''' || ',''' || DECODE(A.AAC004, '2', '女', '1', '男', '其他') || ''''|| ','''|| Pkg_Comm.fun_GetAge(A.AAC006,SYSDATE) ||''''|| ','''|| C.AAE044 || ''''||','''|| TO_CHAR(A.AAC006,'yyyy-MM-dd') || '''' AS OUTSTRING FROM AC01 A, AC60 B, AE10 C WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.AAC001 = B.AAC001 AND B.AAB001 = C.AAZ001 AND (A.AAC002 = #inputString# OR A.AAC003 = #inputString# OR A.AAC001 = #inputString# OR A.yac995 = #inputString# OR A.yac996 = #inputString# OR A.yac997 = #inputString# ) AND B.AAE140 = #aae140# AND B.YAB139 = #yab003# AND B.AAZ257 = (SELECT MAX(AAZ257) FROM AC60 WHERE AAC001 = B.AAC001 AND AAE140 = B.AAE140 AND YAB003 = #yab003#)) WHERE rownum <= 20

SELECT DISTINCT a.aac002 , a.aac003 , a.aac001 , a.aac004 , a.aac006_1 , a.aac006 , a.aae044 FROM (SELECT a.aac002 , a.aac003 , a.aac001 , DECODE(a.aac004, '2', '女', '1', '男', '其他') aac004 , Pkg_Comm.fun_GetAge(a.aac006,SYSDATE) aac006_1 , c.aae044 , TO_CHAR(a.aac006,'yyyy-MM-dd') aac006 FROM AC01 a, AC60 b, AE10 c WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.aac001 = b.aac001 AND b.aab001 = c.aaz001 AND (INSTR(a.aac002, #aac002#)>0 OR INSTR(a.aac003, #aac003#)>0 OR INSTR(a.aac001, #aac001#)>0 OR INSTR(a.yac995, #yac995#)>0 OR INSTR(a.yac996, #yac996#)>0 OR INSTR(a.yac997, #yac997#)>0 ) AND B.AAE140 = #aae140# AND B.YAB139 = #yab003# AND B.AAZ257 = (SELECT MAX(AAZ257) FROM AC60 WHERE AAC001 = B.AAC001 AND AAE140 = B.AAE140 AND YAB003 = #yab003#)) a WHERE rownum <= 20

SELECT DISTINCT OUTSTRING FROM (SELECT '''' || A.AAC002 || '''' || ',''' || A.AAC003 || '''' || ',''' || A.AAC001 || '''' || ',''' || DECODE(A.AAC004, '2', '女', '1', '男', '其他') || ''''|| ','''|| Pkg_Comm.fun_GetAge(A.AAC006,SYSDATE) || ''''|| ','''|| b.aab001 || ''''|| ','''|| D.AAE044 ||'''' AS OUTSTRING FROM AC01 A, AC20 B, AC02 C,AE10 D WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.AAC001 = B.AAC001 AND A.AAC001 = C.AAC001 AND B.AAC001 = C.AAC001 AND B.AAZ159 = C.AAZ159 AND B.AAE140 = C.AAE140 AND B.AAB001 = D.AAZ001 AND C.AAE140 = #aae140# AND C.AAC008 in ('1','4') AND B.AAE140 = #aae140# AND B.YAB139 = #yab003# AND B.AAZ157 = (SELECT MAX(AAZ157) FROM AC20 WHERE AAZ159 = B.AAZ159) AND (A.AAC002 = #inputString# OR A.AAC003 = #inputString# OR A.AAC001 = #inputString# OR A.yac995 = #inputString# OR A.yac996 = #inputString# OR A.yac997 = #inputString# ) ) WHERE rownum <= 20

SELECT DISTINCT AAC002, AAC003, AAC001, AAC004, AAC006, AAB001, AAE044 FROM (SELECT A.AAC002 , A.AAC003 , A.AAC001 , DECODE(A.AAC004, '2', '女', '1', '男', '其他') AAC004 , Pkg_Comm.fun_GetAge(A.AAC006,SYSDATE) AAC006 , B.AAB001 , D.AAE044 FROM AC01 A, AC20 B, AC02 C,AE10 D WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.AAC001 = B.AAC001 AND A.AAC001 = C.AAC001 AND B.AAC001 = C.AAC001 AND B.AAZ159 = C.AAZ159 AND B.AAE140 = C.AAE140 AND B.AAB001 = D.AAZ001 AND C.AAE140 = #aae140# AND C.AAC008 in ('1','4') AND B.AAE140 = #aae140# AND B.YAB139 = #yab003# AND B.AAZ157 = (SELECT MAX(AAZ157) FROM AC20 WHERE AAZ159 = B.AAZ159) AND (INSTR(A.AAC002 , #AAC002#)>0 OR INSTR(A.AAC003 , #AAC003#)>0 OR INSTR(A.AAC001 , #AAC001#)>0 OR INSTR(A.yac995 , #yac995#)>0 OR INSTR(A.yac996 , #yac996#)>0 OR INSTR(A.yac997 , #yac997#)>0 ) ) WHERE rownum <= 20

SELECT DISTINCT OUTSTRING FROM (SELECT '''' || A.AAC002 || '''' || ',''' || A.AAC003 || '''' || ',''' || A.AAC001 || '''' || ',''' || DECODE(A.AAC004, '2', '女', '1', '男', '其他') || ''''|| ','''|| Pkg_Comm.fun_GetAge(TO_DATE(A.AAC006, 'YYYYMMDD'), SYSDATE) || ''''|| ','''|| b.aab001 || ''''|| ','''|| B.YLB003 ||'''' AS OUTSTRING FROM ab67a1 a, ab67 B WHERE a.ylb002 = b.ylb002 AND a.aac002 in (Pkg_Comm.fun_getAac002Conversion(#inputstring#, 15), Pkg_Comm.fun_getAac002Conversion(#inputstring#, 18)))

SELECT DISTINCT AAC002, AAC003, AAC001, AAC004, AAC006, AAB001, YLB003 FROM (SELECT A.AAC002, A.AAC003, A.AAC001, DECODE(A.AAC004, '2', '女', '1', '男', '其他') AAC004, Pkg_Comm.fun_GetAge(TO_DATE(A.AAC006, 'YYYYMMDD'), SYSDATE) AAC006, B.AAB001, B.YLB003 FROM ab67a1 A, ab67 B WHERE a.ylb002 = b.ylb002 AND a.aac002 in (Pkg_Comm.fun_getAac002Conversion(#aac003#, 15), Pkg_Comm.fun_getAac002Conversion(#aac003#, 18)))

SELECT DISTINCT outstring FROM (SELECT ''''||a.aac002||'''' ||','''||a.aac003||'''' ||','''||a.aac001||'''' ||','''||decode(a.aac004,'2','女','1','男','其他')||'''' ||','''|| Pkg_Comm.fun_GetAge(A.AAC006,SYSDATE) || '''' as outstring FROM ac01 a WHERE 1=1 AND nvl(a.yac557,'0')='1' AND(a.aac002 = #inputstring# OR a.aac003 = #inputstring# OR a.aac001 = #inputstring# OR a.yac995 = #inputstring# OR a.yac996 = #inputstring# OR a.yac997 = #inputstring#) ) WHERE rownum <= 20

SELECT DISTINCT aac002, aac003, aac001, aac004, aac006 FROM (SELECT a.aac002, a.aac003, a.aac001, decode(a.aac004,'2','女','1','男','其他') aac004, Pkg_Comm.fun_GetAge(A.AAC006,SYSDATE) aac006 FROM ac01 a WHERE 1=1 AND nvl(a.yac557,'0')='1' AND(INSTR(a.aac002 = #aac002#)>0 OR INSTR(a.aac003 = #aac003#)>0 OR INSTR(a.aac001 = #aac001#)>0 OR INSTR(a.yac995 = #yac995#)>0 OR INSTR(a.yac996 = #yac996#)>0 OR INSTR(a.yac997 = #yac997#)>0) ) WHERE rownum <= 20
